reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Excellent professor! His lectures are very clear and engaging. He makes complex topics easy to understand.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Very knowledgeable and passionate about the subject. Sometimes goes a bit too fast, but overall great.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Good professor, but his lectures can be a bit dry. Needs more interactive sessions.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Not very organized and often seems unprepared. However, she is helpful during office hours.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Great storytelling skills and makes history interesting. However, his grading can be quite tough.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Absolutely amazing professor! She is very approachable and her enthusiasm for the subject is contagious.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: His lectures are detailed but can be monotonous. Needs to make the class more engaging.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Very insightful lectures and provides great real-world examples. Could improve on clarity sometimes.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: One of the best professors I've had! His classes are thought-provoking and he encourages a lot of discussions.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Her lectures are difficult to follow and she doesn't provide enough examples. Needs better structure.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Passionate about the environment and sustainability. Assignments are challenging but fair.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: She knows her stuff, but her lectures can sometimes feel unstructured and hard to follow.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Brilliant professor with a deep understanding of engineering principles. His labs are particularly engaging.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Her passion for art is evident in every lecture. The class is very enjoyable and informative.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Not very engaging and his exams are tough. Would benefit from more practical examples.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Fantastic professor who makes literature come alive. Her classes are always full of energy.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Solid knowledge of business concepts but could use more real-world case studies in his teaching.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: A well-organized course with detailed explanations. Sometimes the pace can be a bit fast, though.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Incredibly talented and knows how to teach music in an understandable way. Highly recommended!

reviews.subject: Astronomy
reviews.review: Interesting lectures, but the material can be difficult to grasp without a strong background in math.
